parameters.name: CpuArch
parameters.description:
The CPU architecture that the driver supports. Valid values:

*   ARMv7
*   ARMv7-HF
*   AArch64
*   x86-64
*   x86

parameters.name: DriverName
parameters.description: The name of the driver to create. The name cannot exceed 20 characters in length and can contain only uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and underscores (\_). It must start with a letter.

parameters.name: DriverProtocol
parameters.description:
The communications protocol that the driver uses. Valid values:

*   modbus: Modbus protocol
*   opc-ua: OPC UA protocol
*   customize: custom protocol

parameters.name: IotInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Internet of Things (IoT) service instance. This parameter is not required for public instances. However, this parameter is required for the instances that you have purchased.

parameters.name: IsBuiltIn
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the driver is a built-in driver.

*   true: indicates that the driver is a built-in driver, that is, the driver code is pre-configured on the gateway device.

*   false: indicates that the driver is not a built-in driver and you must upload the driver code. Default value: false.

> If the driver is not a built-in driver, you must upload the driver code.

parameters.name: Runtime
parameters.description:
The language in which the driver is programmed. Valid values:

*   nodejs8: Node.js v8
*   python3: Python v3.5
*   c: C
